- How you would use first-year supports intentionally (advisor check-ins, office hours, study workshops)—what you’d do in your first month to stay on track

To help me advise you candidly: what are your top 2–3 schools right now, and what would School_D need to offer (academically or in support/activities) to move up on your list? Also, what’s one challenge you faced in school and how did you handle it?
